entry.title: Safer sighashes and more granular SIGHASH_NOINPUT
entry.summary: In a recent message, Christian retracted his previous comments about SINGLE. He was contacted privately and informed that he had mistakenly confused `sighash_single` with `sighash_single|sighash_anyonecanpay`. Christian expressed his appreciation for the correction and stated his desire to avoid any confusion resulting from his previous comments.
